entry.title: RWBY
entry.content:
RWBY 第二部預告片 “White” 終於推出！

之前看完第一部 “Red” 時還沒有特別被萌到，只覺得創意、畫面和音樂都還不錯。不過這次看完 “White” 以後整個點都被打到啦！直接去 itunes 收了這兩首 OST…

下一部 “Black” 預計在 2013.07 發佈，這樣算來本體推出都要 2014 啦！實在是很大一個坑…

{% blockquote %} Mirror, tell me something. Tell me who’s the loneliest of all.

Mirror, tell me something. Tell me who’s the loneliest of all.

Mirror, locked inside of me. Tell me can a heart be turned to stone?

Mirror mirror what’s behind you? Save me from the things I see! I can keep it from the world, why wont you let me hide from me?

Mirror, mirror, tell me something. Who’s the loneliest of all?

I am the loneliest of all. {% endblockquote %}

第一部 “Red”

{% blockquote %} Red like roses fills my dreams and brings me to the place you rest White is cold and always yearning burdened by a royal test Black the beast descends from shadows Yellow beauty burns gold {% endblockquote %}
